publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2502 Fiona McLeod: Munlochy GM Protest Site—That the Parliament congratulates the Ross and Cromarty Planning Committee of Highland Council on its recent decision to grant planning permission for the Munlochy GM protest site; recognises that the deliberate release of genetically modified organisms into the environment threatens Scotland’s reputation as a producer of quality food, and applauds the protesters for their peaceful vigil which has ensured that this issue remains the focus of public attention.
S1M-2502 Munlochy GM Protest Site (lodged on 29 November 2001) Bruce Crawford*, Fergus Ewing*
S1M-2502 Munlochy GM Protest Site (lodged on 29 November 2001) Kay Ullrich*, Tommy Sheridan*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2502 Munlochy GM Protest Site (lodged on 29 November 2001) Brian Adam*
S1M-2502 Munlochy GM Protest Site (lodged on 29 November 2001) Andrew Wilson*, Michael Russell*
S1M-2502 Munlochy GM Protest Site (lodged on 29 November 2001) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2502 Munlochy GM Protest Site (lodged on 29 November 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2502 Munlochy GM Protest Site (lodged on 29 November 2001) Colin Campbell*
S1M-2502 Munlochy GM Protest Site (lodged on 29 November 2001) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
